power-0.title: Below Average
power-0.text: Handles light tasks, struggles with moderate weights.

power-1.title: Average
power-1.text: Lifts moderate weights, performs common physical tasks.

power-2.title: Above Average
power-2.text: Easily handles heavier tasks and moderate weights.

power-3.title: Strong
power-3.text: Lifts heavy objects, performs strenuous activities.

power-4.title: Extremely Strong
power-4.text: Lifts extremely heavy objects with ease.

power-5.title: Superhuman
power-5.text: Performs phenomenal feats, far beyond natural human limits.

dexterity-0.title: Below Average
dexterity-0.text: Struggles with fine motor skills, uncoordinated.

dexterity-1.title: Average
dexterity-1.text: Performs common tasks with normal coordination.

dexterity-2.title: Above Average
dexterity-2.text: Handles precise tasks well, smooth movements.

dexterity-3.title: Nimble
dexterity-3.text: Quick reflexes, handles complex tasks easily.

dexterity-4.title: Extremely Nimble
dexterity-4.text: Performs intricate tasks with exceptional ease.

computation-0.title: Below Average
computation-0.text: Struggles with complex reasoning, makes simple mistakes.

computation-1.title: Average
computation-1.text: Reasonably follows and applies logical thinking.

computation-2.title: Above Average
computation-2.text: Good at solving moderately complex logical problems.

computation-3.title: Proficient
computation-3.text: Strong logical reasoning, solves complex problems.

computation-4.title: Exceptional
computation-4.text: Exceptional logical thinking, solves advanced problems.

computation-5.title: Genius
computation-5.text: Flawless logic, solves extremely complex problems effortlessly.

feel-0.title: Below Average
feel-0.text: Notices common stimuli, but struggles with subtleties.

feel-1.title: Average
feel-1.text: Detects and interprets typical sensory information.

feel-2.title: Above Average
feel-2.text: Notices details others miss, quicker reactions.

feel-3.title: Keen
feel-3.text: Highly attuned, detects subtle changes easily.

feel-4.title: Exceptional
feel-4.text: Almost superhuman sensory perception and awareness.

feel-5.title: Superhuman
feel-5.text: Unparalleled sensory acuity, detects the imperceptible.

presence-0.title: Below Average
presence-0.text: Makes minimal impression, struggles to stand out.

presence-1.title: Average
presence-1.text: Holds own in interactions, moderate impact.

presence-4.title: Exceptional
presence-4.text: Captivating presence, leaves a lasting impression.

serverErrors.CYPU-101: Content of the {{field}} object can not be empty
serverErrors.CYPU-105: You need to log in to do this request
serverErrors.CYPU-201: Some error occurred while creating the {{field}}
